title: impossible d'ouvrir les sites
content:

Firefox ne peut établir de connexion avec le serveur à l’adresse mail02.orange.fr. 

   Le site est peut-être temporairement indisponible ou surchargé. Réessayez plus tard ;    Si vous n’arrivez à naviguer sur aucun site, vérifiez la connexion au réseau de votre ordinateur ;    Si votre ordinateur ou votre réseau est protégé par un pare-feu ou un proxy, assurez-vous que Firefox est autorisé à accéder au Web.

Merci de m'aider en français svp

title: Gestisci eccezioni cancella continuamente i siti aggiunti all elenco eccezioni
content:
Sia "gestisci eccezioni" in "Protezione antitracciamento avanzata", che "gestisci eccezioni" in "Cookie e dati dei siti web" sembrano non funzionare piú.

Se vado in Cookie e dati dei siti web clicco gestisci eccezioni>inserisco l indirizzo>clicco salva modifiche vedo correttamente il sito nella lista delle eccezioni. Lo stesso per le eccezioni in protezione antritracciamento.

Il problema é se chiudo firefox alla sua riapertura le liste delle eccezioni sono vuote.

questo succede solo da quando firefox si é aggiornato alla versione 90.0.2 (64 bit). Ho linux ubuntu 20

title: New Browser Update forcing profile creation and losing all data
content:
Good Morning,

In my organization some years ago I pushed to have Firefox as our default browser and finally was accepted. It has been very good as we have over 10K employees using it. However this last week there has been a new release that forces you to create a new profile, one that is achieved all of you original settings and data are gone. We are a health care organization and cannot have this. I sent the fix (about:profiles) to our triage support department. However once the old profile is chosen and made the default. It will revert back to the new one each time you restart or the next day. I need a permanent fix, is there a way to update the old profile to the new version of Firefox? Shouldnt it stay the default once you make it so? I am getting inundated with calls over this, please send the fix asap.
creator: macros48

title: Issues loading some websites content all of a sudden
content:
Hello, I have issues with some (not all) websites. The problem is that text is not displaying properly all of a sudden. Some letters display and the rest not. The text can be highlighted but still not displaying. I tried to refresh Firefox, Restart with Add-ONs disabled, tried to reinstall FIrefox. Manually tried to disable all Add-ons as well. Then I tried some of the suggestions here https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Set-Cookie/SameSite#browser_compatibility

No matter what I try it's not working well. There was a browser update to version 78.12.0esr (64-bit) made around 20 days ago and had no issues till now. I'm used to Firefox and using it for work a lot and prefer to keep using it. Buttons (links) are not displaying as well but are clickable and opening the content. Screenshots are uploaded as well.

If anyone could suggest how to work it out would be much appreciated. If other details are needed please let me know.

Thank you!

title: Wordpress sites that I work on don't fully display content in FF. Fine in other browsers.
content:
I develop WP websites using DIVI Theme from Elegant Themes. Certain information within DIVI modules such as the section toggle titles don't display. There may be one letter. The toggle character is there. When I toggle, the settings are mostly there and I can set what I need then save. It helps that I know which toggle has the setting I need from working in it so long.

On the front end, sites that I have built show images but much of the the text is not displaying. Everything is fine in Chrome. So it is a browser or OS system.

Macbook Pro late 2008 Yosemite 10.10.5 FF 78.12.0esr (64-bit)

Is by OS supported? Any other ideas. All themes and plugins are up to date. Thanks for any help. I do all my work in FF.
creator: code_sponge

title: Bookmark folders with the same name are merging
content:
In my bookmarks, I have two folders of the same name. They are located under different top folders, though. So:

  • All bookmarks
  • * Bookmarks Toolbar
  • * * topLevel1
  • * * * sameName
  • * * * * "someBookmarks"
  • * * topLevel2
  • * * * sameName
  • * * * * "someOtherBookmarks"

Soon after doing this, they two folders sameName will move to the same top folder, all the bookmarks in the first are copied to the second, and then the second is emptied, such that I end up with this configuration:

  • All bookmarks
  • * Bookmarks Toolbar
  • * * topLevel1
  • * * topLevel2
  • * * * sameName
  • * * * * "someBookmarks"
  • * * * * "someOtherBookmarks"
  • * * * sameName

How do I get this behavior to stop?
creator: pilotwombat

title: Impressão com letra falhando formatado Cupom Fiscal em PDF
content: Encontrei um problema a partir da atualização 90 do navegador que ao imprimir um documento com as dimensões de um cupom fiscal 72x270 em PDF a impressão sai com as letras falhadas, algumas não se consegui nem ler. Fiz testes em outros navegadores e programas que abrem formatado PDF e saem perfeito, também sai corretamente em impressões feitas pelo navegador firefox versão 89 ou mais antigas. Com isso descartei ser problema da própria impressora e sim algo na versão mais recente do navegador. Se encaminha o mesmo documento para uma impressora com dimensão A4, por exemplo, ela sai perfeita. Alguém teria alguma solução para esse problema ?
creator: everton_jb

title: Reopen "opening links in the window on the current virtual desktop"
content:
I just wanted to comment the existing Ticket https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1291420

Which for any reason has been archived. I have the same problem and it is in the way every day:

Quote from the ticket refered: >I use multiple virtual desktops (let's call them A, B, C, and D) on Windows 10, and have a separate Firefox >window running in each.

>When I use the browser on, say, desktop D, then switch to desktop A and click a link from another application, >Firefox moves me back to desktop D and opens the link in a tab back there. If I had opened a blank tab in the >browser on desktop A first, the link would have opened in that window.

>How can I get Firefox to open links in the browser window that is on the current desktop, instead of in the most >recently used window? Chrome works this way, so I don't think it's a fundamental limit of Windows virtual >desktops.

title: Fence Icon Above Email Address Box And Warning That Using Real Email Address Might Allow FaceBook to Track
content:
Today is the first time I noticed a red fence icon above the box where I type my email address to login to the website where I do my work as a bookkeeper for a property management company. When I placed my cursor on the icon it said, "If you use your real email address here, Facebook may be able to track you. Click to learn more." See attached screenshot. But, clicking did nothing.

I'm pretty sure I'm safe since the email address I use to login to work is different from the one I use for Facebook, but could someone please shed more light on this?

Thanks! ~Elise
creator: arrowsandspurs

title: Firefox v90 Slow loading if wireless 5G Home network SSiD is changed.
content: I had to purchase a new wireless router. It is recommended to use a new SSiD name on the new router verses the old one to stop issues with IoT devices. If I use a new recommended SSiD name, Firefox v90 takes well over 2 minutes to load. Google Chrome and Edge load instantly. If I do use the old SSiD Firefox loads normally again but I have problems with a bunch of my IoT devices on the network. I have tried setting the loading page to blank, clean installs, refreshing Firefox and playing with other settings in about:config. (Were does Firefox keep tabs of the network name so I can just clear it?) Is it in the registry? Windows 10 Pro 64 PC - New ASUS RT-AX86U router. Any help would be appreciated.
